name: Paper Plane
preparation:
Invented by Aussie bartender Sam Ross in 2007, the Paper Plane is a modern variation on the Last Word—this time made with equal parts bourbon, Amaro Nonino, Aperol and lemon juice. Supposedly inspired by M.I.A.'s smash hit “Paper Plane” (which was also released in 2007), the cocktail strikes a beautiful balance between bitter, sour and herbal notes.

Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.

Strain into a coupe glass.
